thread.title: Here’s Our First Look At The Truly Magical “Beauty And The Beast” Character Posters
thread.title_full: Here’s Our First Look At The Truly Magical “Beauty And The Beast” Character Posters

author: Casey Rackham
title: Here’s Our First Look At The Truly Magical “Beauty And The Beast” Character Posters
text:
ID: 10405447 2. But now Disney has released posters of EVERY important Beauty and the Beast character, and, honestly, they are so breathtakingly magical. (Mostly because Disney also released ~moving~ posters since this is the future.) View this image ›
Disney ID: 10405320 3. So start humming your favorite song from the movie, sit back, relax, and prepare to say “Ooh” and “Aah” over and over again: ID: 10405346 4. Emma Watson as Belle Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405702 5. Emma Thompson as Mrs. Potts Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405752 6. Ewan McGregor as Lumière Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405781 7. Ian McKellen as Cogsworth Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405837 8. Audra McDonald as Garderobe Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405795 9. Stanley Tucci as Cadenza Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405853 10. Gugu Mbatha-Raw as Plumette Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405880 11. Luke Evans as Gaston Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405897 12. Josh Gad as LeFou Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405931 13. Kevin Kline as Maurice Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405938 14. Dan Stevens as the Beast Disney
Disney
 ID: 10405733 15. And finally, Dan Stevens as the Prince. View this image ›
Disney There doesn’t seem to be a motion poster for the Prince, who, TBH, is the character who really deserves that magical treatment. BUT WE’LL TAKE THIS WONDERFUL PHOTO WITH PLEASURE.
ID: 10405499 16. Come on, March 17. GET HERE FASTER. View this image ›
